DOC.brief_summary: This research aim determine whether 12 week daily dose VSL # 3 measurable effect memory , attention , executive function self-reported mood anxiety healthy old adult .
DOC.brief_title: Investigating Effect Dietary Supplement VSL # 3 Cognition Mood Healthy Older Adults
DOC.detailed_description: This research aim investigate effect dietary supplement VSL # 3 memory , attention , executive function mood healthy old adult . The study randomise double-blind placebo-controlled design eighty participant recruit take part . Forty participant randomly allocate food supplement 40 placebo . As sample initially self-selecting individual volunteer take part , minimisation procedure use randomise group allocation ( Altman & Bland , 2005 ) , volunteer stratify gender . Neither participant research assistant supply supplement know preparation administer , thus ensure double-blind administration . Participants ask take food supplement daily 12 week pre- post- intervention data collect immediately time period . Both pre- post-intervention data collect use validated neuropsychological measure , cognitive measure , EEG self-report questionnaire . Blood sample conduct pre- post-intervention Research Assistant train phlebotomy . Analysis carry measure use two-way ANCOVA , use pre-treatment score covariate .
DOC.criteria: Aged 65 75 MMSE score > 23 Willingness give inform consent Commitment take VSL # 3 supplement daily 12 week Alcohol consumption le 21 unit per week ( men ) , 14 unit per week ( woman ) Current psychoactive medication Significant active medical condition History major psychiatric neurological condition Smoker History epilepsy History traumatic brain injury History immunodeficiency Taking immunosuppressant corticosteroid
